ref: 9967 *mahiṣacāra ʻ grazing for buffaloes ʼ. [mahiṣá- cāra -- 2]
kgr. mehārā m. ʻ grazing -- ground for buffaloes, place in jungle where buffaloes are tethered ʼ.

lang: or kng. Kāṅgrā sub-dialect of Ḍogrī dialect of Panjābī
ref: kgr. mehārā m. ʻ grazing -- ground for buffaloes, place in jungle where buffaloes are tethered ʼ.
